file_content.text: Dread Masters = thwarted // You + Master Gend = heroes of galaxy // Socialization circuits = burnout!
Dread Masters = evil + sneaky + must be stopped // You + Master Gend = only hope!
Master Gend = waiting // You = help him + stop Dread Masters!
Identity database = multiple matches // Your team = very important people + Republic heroes // Socialization circuits = overheating!
Identity database = match // You = very important person + Republic hero // Socialization circuits = overheating!
Opening priority holochannel to Jedi Master Cedral Gend // You = please stand by!
Hello there. When I asked my little friend to find the best of the best, I didn't think he'd try to collect them all.
The Hero of Tython. It's an honor to finally meet you. Few have sacrificed so much for our Order--and the Republic.
Barsen'thor. How good to finally meet my kindred spirit in the Order. I regret our paths haven't crossed before now.
Major, it's an honor. I've had occasion to work with Republic Special Forces in the past, and Havoc Squad is highly-regarded by all.
If it isn't the Republic's most notorious privateer. I've heard your name many times during my journeys through the Outer Rim, Captain.
Well, well. I asked my little friend to find me the best of the best. Apparently, he took the request quite seriously.
Master Cedral Gend of the Jedi Council. I apologize for the imposition, but the Dread Masters have taken a rather drastic step that threatens countless lives. I need your help.
Any threat that requires more than one Jedi must be important. I'll do everything I can.
The Force will be with us.
This isn't the sort of mission you're usually called upon for, but your combat experience will be essential.
I thought I'd met everyone on the Council. I look forward to working with you.
Anything for a fellow Jedi.
Likewise. This is a mission especially suited to our expertise.
The Dread Masters are high on Havoc Squad's target list. We're in.
Ready to move out.
I doubt we'll confront those fiends directly, but we must stop their plans nonetheless.
I can probably lend a hand. Done a few jobs for your boss. How come I'm not hearing from her?
Sure, but where's Satele Shan?
Master Satele is otherwise engaged, and this problem demands an immediate response. I'll tell her you say hello.
I don't know anything about these Dread Masters. Who are they, and what do they want?
Who are the Dread Masters?
The Dread Masters are extraordinarily powerful Sith who are attacking the Republic and Empire alike. How you've avoided them until now is a mystery.
We're already fighting enemies on multiple fronts. What makes the Dread Masters a bigger problem than anyone else right now?
Define "drastic" for me.
The most treacherous threats are the ones beneath our notice. Our enemy has found a way to spread evil where none suspect.
It's best if we discuss the details of this emergency in person. I'm transmitting my coordinates. Come as soon as you can.
Master Gend = great dark side hunter + wise scholar // You + Master Gend = stop Dread Masters!
BB-6G = awaiting important orders + excited to meet you!
